Package ca.phon.ipa.parser

Class IPATokens

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.ipa.parser.IPATokens
public final class IPATokens
extends java.lang.Object
Maps individual glyphs to their IPA token type. Tokens are loaded from the ipa.xml file.
